data_table.description: Visit 5. Subject ID, pathology, maculopathy, photo, diabetic retinopathy, right eye, macular edema, arm, focal narrowing quadrants, focal narrowing superior, focal narrowing inferior, AV nicking quadrants, arterio-venous nicking temporal, vein occlusion, artery occlusion, hollenhorst plaque, peripapillary atrophy, macular hole, large cup to disc ratio, asteroid hyalosis, choroidal nevus, wrinkling retinopathy, ocular histoplasmosis, retinal detachment, and geographic atrophy of participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID

variable.name: RETF03
variable.description: Right eye
